C1r1: I try to choose medications that will have the lowest cost to the patient - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.
C1r2: I only take prescription cost/copay into consideration if a patient brings it up - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.
C1r3: I always take prescription cost/copay into consideration when making treatment decisions - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.

C1r4: Negative feedback from my staff on getting coverage for a branded medication will make me less likely to choose that medication for the next patient - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.
C1r5: I try to avoid prescribing medications that require extra work to get approval (e.g., letter of medical necessity) - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.
C1r6: Prior authorizations are easy to get approved if you know how to navigate "the system" - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.
C1r7: I view navigating insurance coverage as my staff's responsibility - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.
C1r8: Navigating patient insurance coverage is a drain on my/ my staff's time - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.
C1r9: Peer-to-peer reviews are worthwhile to prescribe the medication I feel is most appropriate for my patient - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.
C1r10: Manufacturers provide services that help me navigate the coverage process - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.
C1r11: I have made a change in my clinical management of a patient because of a patient's insurance coverage - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.

C1r12: When I prescribe a medication, I am confident my patient will be getting that medication based on my previous experience - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.
C1r13: A positive change to a medication's coverage is important to my prescribing decision - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.
C1r14: My practice has enough resources to help my patients obtain insurance coverage for the medications I prescribe. - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.
C1r15: Specialty pharmacies help me and my patients obtain coverage of prescribed medications - Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements.
